channel.title: "YOU NEED 30 DEFENCE FOR ARROWS" help
channel.description: hey guys, i am using nitroxscape f2p source . when i try to weild addy arrows, it says u need 30 defence and attack to weild addy arrows, if i use mithril arrows, it says i need 20 defence and attack to weild... if i use steel... 10 defence 10 attack how to change,, i wanna change it so ppl with 1 attack and 1 defence could weild all the arrows? thanks

item.title: "YOU NEED 30 DEFENCE FOR ARROWS" help
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

its a 317 f2p server, nitroxscape source, there is client.java , no wearing.java
i will tell u all the .java i have in my folder:
button.java
cryption.java
frame.java
misc.java
npcmanager.java
prayer.java
special.java
useitem.java
client.java
dialogue.java
item.java
npc.java
player.java
server.java
stream.java
command.java
equipment.java
itemlist.java
npclist.java
playermanager.java
shop.java
text.java

cfg:
autospawn.cfg
npc.cfg
shops.cfg
item.cfg
npcsdrops.cfg

and i also got this:
stackable.dat
notes.dat
sellable.dat
tradeable.dat
twohanded.dat

and i got all the .java into .class ofcourse,
all i need is , in which .java i have to search about it.
i can fix it by my own if u tell me in which .java to search
thanks
